prompts.frontCover:
Flat 2D artwork for a birthday card front cover, in a dreamy fantasy anime style. The scene features two cartoon-illustrated people, based on the reference photo [3ebbdae5-4d1f-4f8a-88ac-e67fcb132f9a], who highly resemble the individuals in the photo, maintaining their exact hairstyles, facial features, clothing (logos omitted), body proportions, and relative positions. They are whimsically depicted riding a giant, fluffy, smiling magical cat that is soaring through a twilight sky filled with sparkling constellations and a soft, glowing moon. The cat is adorned with tiny, twinkling fairy lights tangled in its pastel pink and lavender fur. Below them is an enchanted, sparkling forest with glowing mushrooms and ethereal flowers. The overall atmosphere is magical, enchanting, and humorous, with soft pastel colors and a fairy-tale quality. In the center of the image, written in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script, is the text: "Happy Birthday, Sarah! Hope it's as magical and ridiculous as this."

- Reference photos provided for character creation
- Characters should only appear on the front cover
- Transform real people into artistic cartoon/illustrated versions matching the style
- Maintain recognizable features while adapting to the artistic style
